categories: Category:5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back

nodes.text: "The Fight in the Forest" is a 2017 short story published in the anthology 5-Minute Star Wars Stories Strike Back that is a partial adapation of the Star Wars saga film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
The story re-used illustrations by Pilot Studio previously published in the 2017 young readers book of the same name by Nate Millici, with new text for more advanced readers written by Meredith Rusu.
